name: Deep Space
description: An alien force is threatening to destroy the stability of the galaxy! Play as an unknown creature or a Spacefleet Officer in this Online Sci-Fi Horror!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 3GB memory DirectX: Version 10
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 4GB memory DirectX: Version 10
